short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Fullsight extension is meant to ease the integration between Fullsight and LinkedIn.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Fullsight's extension allows recruiters and business developers to search, create and enrich candidates and customers profiles in Fullsight. 

It also eases the work when using LinkedIn - a recruiter or a business developer doesn't need to open Fullsight's platform to register the information of a LinkedIn profile. Through this extension a LinkedIn profile can be found or copied to Fullsight.
